title: Deposition of Dr. Jessica C. Hawkins
content:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF COOK COUNTY, ILLINOIS

Plaintiffs: Susan J. Harris, et al.
Defendants: Leonard P. Franklin, et al.
CASE NUMBER: CAB08-13579

COPY DATE: March 15, 2023

## DEPOSITION
Pursuant to notice, the following videotaped deposition of DR. JESSICA C. HAWKINS was taken before me, Samuel T. Rhodes, Notary Public, in and for the State of Illinois, at 221 Lexington Avenue, Suite 400, Chicago, Illinois 60601, commencing at 10:13 a.m., when present on behalf of the respective parties:

### APPEARANCES
- DAVID R. HUNTER, ESQUIRE (Plaintiffs)
- SARAH T. WILLIAMS, ESQUIRE & MARCUS A. REID, ESQUIRE (Defendant - United Auto Insurance Company)
- ALSO PRESENT: Mark Stevens, Video Operator

### INDEX
#### WITNESS
- DR. JESSICA C. HAWKINS
  - Voir Dire Examination by Mr. Reid: Page 5
  - Direct Examination by Mr. Reid: Page 11
  - Cross Examination by Mr. Hunter: Page 25
  - Redirect Examination by Mr. Reid: Page 55

### EXHIBITS
- No. 1: Curriculum Vitae - Page 4
- No. 2: Treatment Records - Page 8
- No. 3: Correspondence Log - Page 29 (Retained by Counsel)

EXAMINATION OF DR. JESSICA C. HAWKINS
Dr. Jessica C. Hawkins was called as a witness by counsel for the Defendant, United Auto Insurance Company, and after having been duly sworn by the Notary Reporter, was examined and testified as follows:

### CERTIFICATION
I, Samuel T. Rhodes, Notary Public in and for the State of Illinois, hereby certify that the witness personally appeared before me and was duly sworn, and that the foregoing transcript is a full, true, and accurate record of the evidence given by the witness.

### March 15, 2023
Samuel T. Rhodes, Notary Public
State of Illinois
